name: Spyfall 3
description:
Spyfall is a fun party game meant to be played with 3+ people. At the start of a game, roles are assigned randomly, and you must ask questions to expose the spy.

With Spyfall 3, you can now create and download custom packs by visiting Spyfall.io

These packs can have your own locations and roles, adding even more to the fun.
